trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conjunto de métodos estáticos, propriedades anexadas e eventos para determinar e definir escopos de foco e para definir o elemento focalizado dentro do escopo.

trans-unit.source: In Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: No Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) há dois conceitos relacionados com foco: foco do teclado e foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado referem-se ao elemento que está recebendo entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: There can be only one element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver apenas um elemento com o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This element with keyboard focus has <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este elemento com o foco do teclado tem <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns the element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> Retorna o elemento com o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Logical focus pertains to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Foco lógico se refere ao <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de um escopo específico de foco.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window> classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Pode haver vários elementos com foco lógico, mas só pode haver um elemento com o foco lógico em um escopo de foco único.

trans-unit.source: An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento com foco lógico não necessariamente tem o foco do teclado, mas um elemento com o foco do teclado terá foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: É possível definir um escopo de foco em um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o escopo de foco pai e o escopo de foco filho podem ter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a WPF application that has a <xref:System.Windows.Window> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> which has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: O cenário a seguir ilustra como o foco do teclado e foco lógico alteram em um aplicativo WPF que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Window> com um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> e um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> que tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>.

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus changes from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Quando o foco do teclado muda do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> o foco do teclado perdas mas retém foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Window> focar o escopo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> obtém o foco do teclado e obtém foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focar o escopo.

trans-unit.source: When keyboard focus returns to the root <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the element in <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o foco do teclado retorna para a raiz <xref:System.Windows.Window>, o elemento no <xref:System.Windows.Window> escopo de foco com foco lógico obterá o foco do teclado, que nesse caso é o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> now has keyboard focus and logical focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> agora tem o foco do teclado e foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> perde o foco do teclado, mas manterá foco lógico para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu> focar o escopo.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) e [visão geral de foco](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador ao evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be added.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um manipulador ao evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: The element with logical focus in the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O elemento com o foco lógico no escopo de foco especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element with logical focus within the specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento com o foco lógico dentro do escopo de foco especificado.

trans-unit.source: The element in the specified focus scope with logical focus.
trans-unit.target: O elemento no escopo de foco especificado com foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> é o elemento que tem foco lógico para um escopo específico de foco.

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto pode ou não pode ter o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado refere-se ao elemento que recebe entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se `element` não é um escopo de foco, esse método retornará `null`.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>, para especificar o elemento com foco lógico em um escopo de foco especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> and it gets the element with logical focus by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GetFocusedElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o elemento com foco lógico usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> e obtém o elemento com foco lógico usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GetFocusedElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to get the closest focus scope for.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual obter o escopo de foco mais próximo.

trans-unit.source: Determines the closest ancestor of the specified element that has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina o ancestral mais próximo do elemento especificado que tem <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> definido como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: O escopo do foco do elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window> classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the attached property.
trans-unit.target: O elemento do qual ler a propriedade anexada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> is a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> especificado é um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> is set to <see langword="true" /> on the specified element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> é definido como <see langword="true" /> no elemento especificado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window> classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope" /> anexada.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> on a <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Window>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window> classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" /> anexado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Remove um manipulador para o evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GotFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> that listens to this event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> que escuta esse evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler to be removed.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Remove um manipulador para o evento anexado <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.LostFocus" />.

trans-unit.source: The focus scope in which to make the specified element the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement" />.
trans-unit.target: O escopo do foco no qual o elemento especificado se torna <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to give logical focus to.
trans-unit.target: O elemento a receber foco lógico.

trans-unit.source: Sets logical focus on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Determina o foco lógico no elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> é o elemento que tem foco lógico para o escopo de foco específico.

trans-unit.source: This object may or may not have keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto pode ou não pode ter o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: O foco do teclado refere-se ao elemento que recebe entrada do teclado.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in.
trans-unit.target: É possível especificar um escopo de foco que é um ancestral do escopo de foco, que o elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is a focus scope and its parent <xref:System.Windows.Window> is a focus scope, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> could specify the <xref:System.Windows.Window> as the focus scope when calling <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> é um escopo de foco e seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Window> é um escopo de foco, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> filho a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> poderia especificar o <xref:System.Windows.Window> como o escopo de foco ao chamar <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is then <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> for both the <xref:System.Windows.Window> focus scope and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> é, em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A> para ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Window> focar o escopo e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> focar o escopo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> dará o foco lógico do elemento especificado no escopo de foco especificado e tenta dar o foco do teclado de elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> and it gets the element with logical focus by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GetFocusedElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir define o elemento com foco lógico usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetFocusedElement%2A> e obtém o elemento com foco lógico usando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.GetFocusedElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The element to make a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: O elemento para criar um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <c>element</c> is a focus scope; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <c>elemento</c> é um escopo de foco; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> as a focus scope.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> especificado como um escopo de foco.

trans-unit.source: A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> within its scope.
trans-unit.target: Um escopo de foco é um elemento de contêiner que controla o <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.FocusedElement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> dentro de seu escopo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> class is a focus scope as are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Window> classe é um escopo de foco são o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> classes.

trans-unit.source: An element which is a focus scope has <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento que é um escopo de foco tem <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.IsFocusScope%2A> definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o foco, o foco do teclado e foco lógico, consulte o [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The follow example makes an element a focus scope by using <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetIsFocusScope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir faz um elemento de um escopo de foco usando <xref:System.Windows.Input.FocusManager.SetIsFocusScope%2A>.
